sys_ux_client_script.name: ListMenu Toggle

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_6f37cfb8472231107b748a5f746d4379
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="List">1b3707b8472231107b748a5f746d43f8</macroponent><name>ListMenu Toggle</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    const listPreference = api.state.listMenuOpenPreference;
    const open = event.payload.listMenuOpen;

    api.setState('listMenuOpen', open);
    api.setState('listDisplayPanes', open? 'both': 'right');
 
    api.data.setListPreference.execute({
        'name': listPreference,
        'value': open
    });    
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>kiril.shandaliuk</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-11-14 13:19:27</sys_created_on><sys_id>6f37cfb8472231107b748a5f746d4379</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ListMenu Toggle</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Finance Request" source="x_1178586_financ_0">2194808c472231107b748a5f746d43fd</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Finance Request">2194808c472231107b748a5f746d43fd</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_6f37cfb8472231107b748a5f746d4379</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>kiril.shandaliuk</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-11-14 13:19:27</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
